recipe.title: Coriander Tofu Mayonnaise
ingredients: Sea salt and cracked black pepper
instructions: Place the tofu, lime, coriander, salt and pepper in a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Serve as you would mayonnaise. Refrigerate for up to 10 days, or for the shelf life of the tofu you are using.
